thread.title: Mozilla releases first public preview of new Firefox browser for iOS
thread.title_full: Mozilla releases first public preview of new Firefox browser for iOS | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Mozilla releases first public preview of new Firefox browser for iOS
text:
Mozilla has released the first public preview of its Firefox browser for iOS. According to The Next Web, the public preview is available only to the users in New Zealand.
This limitation is so it can gather feedback before taking it to a few more countries ahead of any public launch.
The organization wants to hear from the users about three key features, intelligent search, which provides suggested search results, Firefox Accounts, which allows the users to sync their browser history, passwords and tabs from their desktop to their iOS device, and Visual Tabs, which displays thumbnails of all the pages they are browsing.
Mozilla wants to release Firefox to the App Store globally later this year.
 04, 2015 7:40 pm
